summary: This is an email dated July 27, 2019, with the subject line referencing organized crime, metals manipulation, fraudulent audits involving Deutsche Bank, and linking these to mafia activities, pedophilia, and Jeffrey Epstein. The email is addressed to Jean James, but the sender and body content are not provided in the excerpt.

keyFacts: An email dated July 27, 2019, links Jeffrey Epstein to allegations of organized crime, metals manipulation, and fraudulent audits involving Deutsche Bank.
The email subject explicitly connects financial crimes ('ORGANIZED CRIMES - METALS MANIPULATION, FRAUDULENT AUDITS: DEUTSCHE ET AL') with mafia activities and pedophilia.
The correspondence is addressed to an individual named Jean James, but the sender and full content are not shown in the provided excerpt.
